articles.author: Ashley Strickland
articles.title: Meet the lunar rover that will venture to the moon’s south pole - CNN
articles.description: This week, meet the next generation of lunar rovers, glimpse stunning new photos of the solar surface, encounter colorful new species across Asia, learn about an unusual ancient predator, and more.
articles.content:
Editors Note: A version of this story appeared in CNNs Wonder Theory science newsletter. To get it in your inbox, sign up for free here.
At the heart of human nature is a desire to explore. Nowhere … [+4680 chars]
